Bur littie has been done to this edition save to add Notes on the Lives from Epaminondas (XV), and onwards. A Lexicon has also been added, which is believed to be accurate. A Historical and Geographi- cal Index completes the additions which have been made. It is proper to state that the editor of the first edition of this work is not responsible for the addi- tions now made. They have been added owing to the pressing desire of teaehers to possess the complete work. These additions will be found to be improve- ments, aud serve to render the work as nearly perfect as the plan submitted permitted.
